Class WeekPlanController

java.lang.Object
controller.BaseControllers.Controller
controller.BaseControllers.MainAppController
controller.WeekPlanningControllers.WeekPlanController
Direct Known Subclasses:
AutoGenerateWeekController
public class WeekPlanController extends MainAppController
Class controlling all the methods on the FXML view of the week planning window
